title: Escape Game – FORT BOYARD 2022
description:
“Fort Boyard awaits you with numerous challenges to take-up solo, with family or even with your friends! Within the legendary fortress, you will face new dangers , solve tricky enigma, and live electrifying time trial to obtain the keys of the Treasure room detained by the Father Fouras.
To escape, you will have 4 highly motivated candidates with you. Together, you will face fierce enemies, live mind-blowing twists and do a bunch of stunts. The perfect combination for an unprecedented escape game experience Throw back in time with the Time Machine and experience 6 mythical challenges of the Fort There is even a surprise guest: Willy Rovelli. Our very special French chef is also on board and it is time for a cooking contest! Ready to challenge his “”delightful cuisine””? Will you be able to escape this crazy universe and survive his horrific meals?” MADiSON
